groups.name: test-resources.containers.*
groups.description:
Represents the mutable view of the container metadata, for
 documentation purposes.
 See  for the immutable version
 which is used internally.

properties.name: test-resources.containers.*.image-name
properties.description: Returns the name of the docker image to use for the test resources container.

properties.name: test-resources.containers.*.hostnames
properties.description:
Returns the names of the properties which will be set
 to the host name of the container.

properties.name: test-resources.containers.*.exposed-ports
properties.description: The map of property names to port names.

properties.name: test-resources.containers.*.ro-fs-bind
properties.description: Returns the map of read-only system bindings.

properties.name: test-resources.containers.*.rw-fs-bind
properties.description: Returns the map of read-write system bindings.

properties.name: test-resources.containers.*.working-directory
properties.description: The working directory for the container.

properties.name: test-resources.containers.*.labels
properties.description: The labels to set on the started container.

properties.name: test-resources.containers.*.startup-timeout
properties.description: The startup timeout of the container.

properties.name: test-resources.containers.*.copy-to-container
properties.description: The files to be copied to the container.

properties.name: test-resources.containers.*.memory
properties.description: The memory limit of the container.

properties.name: test-resources.containers.*.swap-memory
properties.description: The swap memory limit of the container.

properties.name: test-resources.containers.*.shared-memory
properties.description: The shared memory limit of the container.

properties.name: test-resources.containers.*.network
properties.description: The network this container will belong to.

properties.name: test-resources.containers.*.network-aliases
properties.description:
The list of names this container will use in
 a custom network.
